title: All sold: T205 HOF and Commons - Trimmed
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: All sold: T205 HOF and Commons - Trimmed
posts.post_content:
THE CARDS FOR SALE BELOW ARE TRIMMED

These are from a scrapbook rescue project. I soaked the cards in distilled water ONLY to remove them from the pages and dried them between non-bleached paper towels. As you can see in the scans, there are glue stains on most and paper loss on some.  All of the cards in this lot were trimmed many years ago prior to pasting them into the album.

Shipping is $4, unless you spend $100 total, then it is free. Prices are net to me, with PayPal preferred.

Please email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks!
